metadata.title: CVE-2015-0223 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Apache Qpid 0.30 and earlier allows remoteattackers to bypass access restrictions on qpidd via unknown vectors,related to 0-10 connection handling.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
